changes.change: Switching floors will no longer sometimes cause your Edit and Delete buttons to become grayed out until you refresh the page. Thanks Akiranai for reporting!
Clicking on an empty pull in the sidebar no longer causes the map to go blank. Thanks Ogando | Steffen for reporting!

Sanguine Depths: Removed Famished Tick link with the first boss - kept the note about it being bugged sometimes though. Fixed various MDT coupling errors on the General Kaal gauntlet, leading to import warnings. Removed a Wicket Oppressor in that same gauntlet that isn't actually there.

Plaguefall: Added a missing Unstable Canister after the second boss. Thanks greatman for reporting! Plaguebound Devoted with NPC id 171188/173840 now properly give 4 enemy forces instead of 0. Thanks Sonskyn for reporting!
De Other Side: Added button that engineers can press in Mechagon to stop the flow of slimes. Thanks /r/CompetitiveWoW.
Halls of Atonement: Changed a Depraved Obliterator into a Depraved Darkblade in the pack right in front of the first boss.
The Necrotic Wake: Added missing floor switch marker from Zolramus to Stitchwerks.
Spires of Ascension: Spires of Ascension: Three enemies were inside the contours of a pack, but were not actually assigned to the pack. This has been corrected, attempt 2.
Importing objects from MDT strings now respect the visible flag, if they aren't visible in MDT they will be ignored when importing. Thanks Ogando | Steffen for reporting!
De Other Side: Fixed Risen Bonesoldier in the first pack not being imported properly. Thanks Ogando | Steffen for reporting (seeing a pattern yet?)
Halls of Atonement: Fixed MDT coupling with Loyal Stoneborns - they will no longer give import warnings.
